Public Works
============

### The Public Works Director provides an interface between the divisions within the Public Works Department, the City Administration and City Council.

Cort Fyvie

Public Works Director

[![Email](https://anahuac.us/wp-content/plugins/team-members/inc/img/links/email.png)](mailto:c.fyvie@anahauc.us "Email")

The Public Works Director coordinates Public Works projects with the County Engineer, City of Anahuac contract Engineer, consultants and other agencies as necessary and strives to maintain a positive working relationship required to carry out the projects.



[![logo](https://anahuac.us/wp-content/themes/anahuac/assets/images/footer-logo.png)](https://anahuac.us)

![location](https://anahuac.us/wp-content/themes/anahuac/assets/images/ftLocation.png)

501 Miller Street
  
P O Box 578
  
Anahuac, Texas 77514

![officehours](https://anahuac.us/wp-content/themes/anahuac/assets/images/clock.png)

Monday - Friday:
  
7:00a.m. - 4:00p.m.

##### Tax Information

This budget will raise more revenue from property taxes than last year’s budget by an amount of $6,838.00, which is a .0096 increase from last year’s budget. The property tax revenue to be raised from new property added to the tax roll this year is $70,742.

[Current Budget](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bxZY42TYBW7er47SSE1rylSvCbh-kQHB/view?usp=drive_link)
